entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
